name: UpdateTeamInfo
description:
Update information of a specified team.

Use this tool to modify details of an existing team by providing the team ID and the updated information.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team whose information you want to update.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the team's updated details, including name, avatar, slug, description, and policies.

avatar.description: The hash value of an uploaded image.

description.description: A short text that describes the team.

previewDeploymentSuffix.description: Suffix that will be used for all preview deployments.

regenerateInviteCode.description: Create a new invite code and replace the current one.

enforced.description: Require that members of the team use SAML Single Sign-On.

roles.description: Directory groups to role or access group mappings.

slug.description: A new slug for the team.

enablePreviewFeedback.description: Enable preview toolbar: one of on, off or default.

enableProductionFeedback.description: Enable production toolbar: one of on, off or default.

sensitiveEnvironmentVariablePolicy.description: Sensitive environment variable policy: one of on, off or default.

enabled.description: Enable or disable remote caching for the team.

remoteCaching.description: Whether or not remote caching is enabled for the team

hideIpAddresses.description: Display or hide IP addresses in Monitoring queries.

hideIpAddressesInLogDrains.description: Display or hide IP addresses in Log Drains.

deploymentType.description: Specify if the password will apply to every Deployment Target or just Preview

password.description: The password that will be used to protect Project Deployments

passwordProtection.description: Allows to protect project deployments with a password

deploymentType.description: Specify if the Vercel Authentication (SSO Protection) will apply to every Deployment Target or just Preview

ssoProtection.description: Ensures visitors to your Preview Deployments are logged into Vercel and have a minimum of Viewer access on your team

defaultDeploymentProtection.description: Default deployment protection settings for new projects.

expiration.description: The time period to keep non-production deployments for

expirationProduction.description: The time period to keep production deployments for

expirationCanceled.description: The time period to keep canceled deployments for

expirationErrored.description: The time period to keep errored deployments for

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The unique slug for the team used to perform the request.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.
